screens.description: Show this when the Commercialisation Engagement record is not yet at Stage "Commercialisation Ready".
screens.name: CommercialisationNotReadyScreen
screens.label: Commercialisation Is Not Yet Ready

fields.name: CommercialisationNotReadyMessage
fields.fieldText: You cannot create an opportunity unless the engagement is Commercialisation Ready

fields.name: OppDetails
fields.fieldText: Opportunity Details

fields.name: Opportunity_Name_Com
fields.helpText: When creating a new opportunity, it must meet the following naming convention: RCO: <Insert descriptive name> - <Year>. An example is: RCO: Aqueous Zinc Ion Battery Production - 2023.

validationRule.errorMessage: You can't enter more than 120 characters.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_OppDetails
fields.fieldText: Opportunity Details

fields.name: Opportunity_Name_RP
fields.helpText: When creating a new opportunity, it must meet the following naming convention: RPO: <Insert descriptive name> - <Year>. An example is: RPO: Textile Waste Recycling Management - 2023.

validationRule.errorMessage: You can't enter more than 120 characters.

fields.name: NewOpportunityStewardshipModalTitlte
fields.fieldText: Opportunity Details

variables.description: OwnerId taken from the record if it is an Engagement Commercialisation
variables.name: CommercialisationOwnerId
